video_title: A daily question to guide youâ€¦ Will you put it into practice? #mindset #motivation
transcript:
so this is the simplest way to change
your life from what I found you ask
yourself this question as many times you
can throughout the day the question is
is what I'm doing right now getting me
closer to or further from my goals if
the answer is closer to then keep doing
that thing but if the answer is further
from immediately stop what you're doing
and take a different action that's going
to help you get closer to your goals
